languages.text: "Сбежала, проклятая девка! Какая жалость... Сиятельн{mf|ый|ая} {name}, нижайше прошу извинений за эту безобразную сцену! Надеюсь, это событие никак не отразится на ваших соглашениях и договорах с Наместником... каковы бы они ни были!" {n}Он чуть медлит, а потом словно спохватывается.{/n} "Прошу, примите этот груз, изъятый у проклятой еретички, в качестве компенсации!"

traits.locale_text: "Сбежала, проклятая девка! Какая жалость... Сиятельн{mf|ый|ая} {name}, нижайше прошу ваших извинений за эту безобразную сцену! Надеюсь, это событие никак не отразится на ваших соглашениях и договорах с Наместником... каковы бы они ни были!"

languages.text: "The damned wench ran! A terrible shame, this is... Most noble {name}, I humbly beg your forgiveness for this unsightly scene! I hope that this episode won't affect any of your agreements with the Liege... whatever those may be!" {n}He hesitates for a moment, then seems to catch his breath.{/n} "Please accept the cargo taken from the accursed heretic as compensation!"
languages.original_text: "Сбежала, проклятая девка! Какая жалость... Сиятельн{mf|ый|ая} {name}, нижайше прошу извинений за эту безобразную сцену! Надеюсь, это событие никак не отразится на ваших соглашениях и договорах с Наместником... каковы бы они ни были!" {n}Он чуть медлит, а потом словно спохватывается.{/n} "Прошу, примите этот груз, изъятый у проклятой еретички, в качестве компенсации!"

"The damned wench ran! A terrible shame, this is... The most noble {name}, I humbly beg your forgiveness for this unsightly scene! I hope that this episode won't affect any of your agreements with the Liege... whatever those may be!"

I hope that this episode won't affect any of your agreements with the Liege... whatever those may be!" {n}He hesitates for a moment, then seems to catch his breath.{/n} "Please accept the cargo taken from the accursed heretic as compensation!"

I hope that this episode won't affect any of your agreements with the Liege... whatever those may be!" {n}He hesitates for a moment, then seems to catch his breath.{/n} "Please accept the cargo taken from the accursed heretic as compensation!"

"The damned wench ran! A terrible shame, this is... Most noble {name}, I humbly beg your forgiveness for this unsightly scene! I hope that this episode won't affect any of your agreements with the Liege... whatever those may be!" {n}He hesitates for a moment, then seems to catch his breath.{/n} "Please accept the cargo taken from the accursed heretic as compensation!"

languages.text: “那该死的女人逃跑了！这是何等耻辱的事情啊……最尊贵的{name}，我谦卑地请求您原谅这让所有人不快的一幕。我衷心希望，这段小小插曲不会影响到您与总督之间的任何协议……无论您达成了什么协议！”{n}他犹豫片刻，之后似乎喘了口气。{/n}“作为补偿，请收下这批从该死的异端分子手中缴获的货物吧！”
languages.original_text: "The damned wench ran! A terrible shame, this is... Most noble {name}, I humbly beg your forgiveness for this unsightly scene! I hope that this episode won't affect any of your agreements with the Liege... whatever those may be!" {n}He hesitates for a moment, then seems to catch his breath.{/n} "Please accept the cargo taken from the accursed heretic as compensation!"

traits.locale_text: “那该死的女人逃跑了！这是何等耻辱的事情啊……最尊贵的{name}，我谦卑地请求您原谅这让所有人不快的一幕。我衷心希望，这段小小插曲不会影响到您与总督之间的任何协议……无论您达成了什么协议！”{n}他犹豫片刻，之后似乎喘了口气。{/n}“作为补偿，请收下这批从该死的异端分子手中缴获的货物吧！”

languages.text: «¡Se ha escapado la muy impía! Qué gran lástima... Nobilísim{mf|o|a} {name}, ¡espero que pueda perdonarme por haber causado semejante escena! Solo puedo rezar para que ninguno de sus acuerdos con el señor, sean los que fueren, se vean afectados...». {n}Duda por unos instantes hasta recuperar el aliento.{/n} «Por favor, como compensación, ¡llévese el cargamento de la hereje!».
languages.original_text: "The damned wench ran! A terrible shame, this is... Most noble {name}, I humbly beg your forgiveness for this unsightly scene! I hope that this episode won't affect any of your agreements with the Liege... whatever those may be!" {n}He hesitates for a moment, then seems to catch his breath.{/n} "Please accept the cargo taken from the accursed heretic as compensation!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Se ha escapado la muy impía! Qué gran lástima... Nobilísim{mf|o|a} {name}, ¡espero que pueda perdonarme por haber causado semejante escena! Solo puedo rezar para que ninguno de sus acuerdos con el señor, sean los que fueren, se vean afectados...». {n}Duda por unos instantes hasta recuperar el aliento.{/n} «Por favor, como compensación, ¡llévese el cargamento de la hereje!».

languages.text: 「あの女が逃げた！ なんとお恥ずかしい、これは…高貴なる{name}様、先ほどの見苦しい場面をどうかお許しください！今回の件があなたとリージュとの協定にどうか影響を及ぼしませんように…何であっても！」{n}男は一瞬ためらって、それから息を整えた。{/n}「呪われた異端者から奪った貨物を償いとしてお受け取りください！」
languages.original_text: "The damned wench ran! A terrible shame, this is... Most noble {name}, I humbly beg your forgiveness for this unsightly scene! I hope that this episode won't affect any of your agreements with the Liege... whatever those may be!" {n}He hesitates for a moment, then seems to catch his breath.{/n} "Please accept the cargo taken from the accursed heretic as compensation!"

traits.locale_text: 「あの女が逃げた！ なんとお恥ずかしい、これは…高貴なる{name}様、先ほどの見苦しい場面をどうかお許しください！今回の件があなたとリージュとの協定にどうか影響を及ぼしませんように…何であっても！」{n}男は一瞬ためらって、それから息を整えた。{/n}「呪われた異端者から奪った貨物を償いとしてお受け取りください！」

languages.text: "Das verdammte Frauenzimmer ist geflohen! Was für eine Schande ...! {mf|Edelster|Edelste} {name}, ich bitte demütigst um Vergebung für diese unwürdige Szene! Ich hoffe, der Vorfall hat keinen Einfluss auf Eure Abmachungen mit dem Lehnsherren ... wie diese auch aussehen mögen!" {n}Er zögert kurz und scheint dann wieder zu Atem zu kommen.{/n} "Bitte akzeptiert die Fracht der verfluchten Ketzerin als Wiedergutmachung!"
languages.original_text: "The damned wench ran! A terrible shame, this is... Most noble {name}, I humbly beg your forgiveness for this unsightly scene! I hope that this episode won't affect any of your agreements with the Liege... whatever those may be!" {n}He hesitates for a moment, then seems to catch his breath.{/n} "Please accept the cargo taken from the accursed heretic as compensation!"

traits.locale_text: "Das verdammte Frauenzimmer ist geflohen! Was für eine Schande ...! {mf|Edelster|Edelste} {name}, ich bitte demütigst um Vergebung für diese unwürdige Szene! Ich hoffe, der Vorfall hat keinen Einfluss auf Eure Abmachungen mit dem Lehnsherren ... wie diese auch aussehen mögen!" {n}Er zögert kurz und scheint dann wieder zu Atem zu kommen.{/n} "Bitte akzeptiert die Fracht der verfluchten Ketzerin als Wiedergutmachung!"

languages.text: « La diablesse, elle a filé ! Quel malheur... Noble {name}, j'implore humblement votre pardon pour cette scène honteuse ! J'espère qu'elle n'influera en rien sur les accords que vous avez passés avec le suzerain... quels qu'ils soient ! » {n}Il hésite quelques instants, avant de reprendre son souffle.{/n} « Je vous prie d'accepter le chargement saisi à l'hérétique en compensation ! »
languages.original_text: "The damned wench ran! A terrible shame, this is... Most noble {name}, I humbly beg your forgiveness for this unsightly scene! I hope that this episode won't affect any of your agreements with the Liege... whatever those may be!" {n}He hesitates for a moment, then seems to catch his breath.{/n} "Please accept the cargo taken from the accursed heretic as compensation!"

traits.locale_text: « La diablesse, elle a filé ! Quel malheur... Noble {name}, j'implore humblement votre pardon pour cette scène honteuse ! J'espère qu'elle n'influera en rien sur les accords que vous avez passés avec le suzerain... quels qu'ils soient ! » {n}Il hésite quelques instants, avant de reprendre son souffle.{/n} « Je vous prie d'accepter le chargement saisi à l'hérétique en compensation ! »

languages.text: "Kaçtı lanet fahişe! Korkunç bir utanç, bu... Şahit olduğunuz bu çirkin görüntü için naçizane özrümü kabul edin pek asil {name} {mf|Bey|Hanım}! Umarım bu hadise, Emîr ile yaptığınız anlaşmaları etkilemez. Anlaşmalarınız sizi ilgilendirir tabii!.." {n}Bir an tereddüt ediyor, sonra soluklanıyor.{/n} "Lütfen lanet kâfirden aldığımız kargoyu telafi olarak kabul buyurun!"
languages.original_text: "The damned wench ran! A terrible shame, this is... Most noble {name}, I humbly beg your forgiveness for this unsightly scene! I hope that this episode won't affect any of your agreements with the Liege... whatever those may be!" {n}He hesitates for a moment, then seems to catch his breath.{/n} "Please accept the cargo taken from the accursed heretic as compensation!"

traits.locale_text: "Kaçtı lanet fahişe! Korkunç bir utanç, bu... Şahit olduğunuz bu çirkin görüntü için naçizane özrümü kabul edin pek asil {name}! Umarım bu olaylar Emîr ile yaptığınız anlaşmaları etkilemez. Artık her ne iseler!.." {n}Bir an tereddüt ediyor, sonra soluklanıyor.{/n} "Lütfen telafi olarak lanetli kâfirden alınan kargoyu kabul edin!"
